reviews.customers_say: Customers find this dress feminine and flattering, particularly appreciating its perfect length and comfortable fit, with one noting it accommodates different body types.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfectly All White!
items.body: I purchased this dress, to wear on a cruise, for White Night. It was perfect and I received several compliments! I'm 5' 4", weight about 140 and have a 34DDD bust. While wearing this, I felt very confident; hides my tummy, my upper arms, fits well in the chest, etc. I like the length as it was just above the ankles on me. It's feminine, light weight and it's not sheer like most white clothing is. While it cost a little more than I normally like to pay for clothing, I'm really glad I bought this dress. Read more
items.author: DolphinGirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect dress
items.body: very cute, i was looking for a longer dress for pictures we are going to be taking and it’s the perfect length. it fits nicely, for reference i am 5’4 and about 130lbs and ordered a small. it does have a little weight to it but definitely comfortable. Read more
items.author: Victoria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: So cute and fits great. I am a 5’2” 130lbs and the size was good. Fabric is very nice, will get lots of wear out of this in the spring and summer. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This is a beautiful dress. I bought this dress for my sister, and the fit is lovely. She has a pear-shaped body, but it drapes really well, and the length isn't too long on her. It's a true midi dress on her 5'5" frame. My only gripe is there's no inner lining, so if you buy a lighter color, it becomes slightly see through. Other than that, I would buy another one, but maybe in a darker color. Read more
items.author: Crystal Cho

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for family photos!
items.body: This dress was perfect for our fall family photos! I ordered a size L in the apricot color and it was beautiful. I am 5’7”, 170lbs, soft belly (9 months postpartum) and this dress made me feel very pretty. I wore it with a nursing bra underneath but you could definitely wear it with a regular or no bra. It’s not see through at all and was so Comfortable! Highly recommend Read more
items.author: Jackie Panos

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pattern issue
items.body: Cute dress but the pattern is not very noticeable on the cleavage area. Also the material became very “rough” after steaming it. Wear and tear would definitely show after washing this a few times Read more
items.author: Anonymous

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable & Flattering
items.body: The dress is super comfy! The stretchy top is great for any bust size and the body of the dress is surprisingly good quality. I love the color as well. The flutter sleeves are perfect as someone who has always been insecure about their upper arms! Lol. I’m 5’5 and 152lbs and I ordered the Medium in dark red. Read more
items.author: Lindsay

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress
items.body: Got this for my bridal shower and it was so cute! Good length and material. Fit great. Had to steam iron it prior to but it did t take long at all. Read more
items.author: Shelby Jordan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Hotpink, Blue, Apricot, Black, Sage, Dustyblue, Pink, White, Purple, Light Pink, Caramel, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
